title.narrative: Hope in Crops Community Adaptation Project

description.narrative: Hope in Crops will continue its work for the distribution of crops plants and seeds to families, members and school based projects. HIC continues the research on the varieties of plants and food crops to evaluate how they perform given the changing climate. The school based education and food program continues in approximately 30-45 schools in the district, although they have many more demands from other schools and the district administration to expand. They are still working to fully implement the 45 school based projects. SFMG is exploring green technologies for food production, clean drinking water, for housing, and as a demonstration project. SFMG is beginning conversations Sikalagala Technical Institute about the green building project that was the subject of the technical assistance trip to the U.S. in May, 2015, in development as a mission related loan program.
